des:
domovea is a gateway that enhances your KNX electrical installation. By linking it to the Amazon Echo skill, you are able to control any device of your KNX installation with the sound of your voice. Reach into a new world of possibilities using domovea and combine it with Amazon Alexa to simplify your daily life with the sound of your voice. It is as easy as asking Alexa to turn outlets and lights on or off, adjust dimmers, move up or down shutters, turn on or off speakers, set connected thermostats and much more.

To get started, you first need to create a free account on our cloud. Then select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App to authorize your Hager cloud account and you are ready to talk.

When using the skill, you can specify a defined scene or trigger a specific task for your home - here are some of our favorites things to talk about:
“Alexa, set the thermostat to 23 degrees please"
"Alexa, turn on I am leaving”
"Alexa, turn on I am coming”

Please note that it is essential that you own a KNX system at your home and also a preconfigured Hager domovea hardware is required to use this skill (compatible only with TJA670 or TJA470).
Please contact your local electrician to find out more about the Hager domovea.
